description: This file contains internal declarations and function prototypes for handling ASN.1 attribute objects within the BroadWay Service Delivery System. It includes functions for managing ASN.1 attribute memory, encoding, cloning, comparison, copying, and dumping.

methods.name: AnscAsn1AttrFree
methods.description: Frees resources associated with an ASN.1 attribute object.

methods.name: AnscAsn1AttrGetSizeOfEncodedTag
methods.description: Returns the size of the encoded ASN.1 tag for the attribute.

methods.name: AnscAsn1AttrClone
methods.description: Creates a copy of the ASN.1 attribute object.

methods.name: AnscAsn1AttrEqualsTo
methods.description: Compares two ASN.1 attribute objects for equality.

methods.name: AnscAsn1AttrCopyValueFrom
methods.description: Copies the value from one ASN.1 attribute object to another.

methods.name: AnscAsn1AttrEncodingData
methods.description: Encodes the ASN.1 attribute data into a specified format.

methods.name: AnscAsn1AttrDump
methods.description: Outputs a textual dump of the ASN.1 attribute's internal state.
